mapper.select:
SELECT g.Identificador as g_Identificador, g.numero as g_numero,
p.Codigo as p_Codigo, p.nombre as p_nombre, p.apellido as p_apellido, p.celular as p_celular, p.correo as p_correo, p.clave as p_clave,
m.Codigo as m_Codigo, m.semestre_ingreso as m_semestre_ingreso, m.programa_academico as m_programa_academico, m.nombre as m_nombre, m.apellido as m_apellido, m.celular as m_celular, m.correo as m_correo, m.clave as m_clave,
s.Identificador as s_Identificador, s.years as s_years, s.periodo_academico as s_periodo_academico, s.fecha_inicio as s_fecha_inicio, s.fecha_fin as s_fecha_fin,
a.Codigo as a_Codigo, a.nombre as a_nombre, a.apellido as a_apellido, a.celular as a_celular, a.correo as a_correo, a.clave as a_clave,
f.Identificador as f_Identificador, f.dia as f_dia, f.hora_inicio as f_hora_inicio, f.hora_fin as f_hora_fin,
c.Nemonico as c_Nemonico, c.nombre as c_nombre, c.creditos as c_creditos, c.horas_monitoria as c_horas_monitoria,
t.Identificador as t_Identificador, t.nombre as t_nombre, t.descripcion as t_descripcion
FROM Grupo as g left join Profesor as p ON g.profesor_codigo=p.Codigo left join Monitor as m ON g.monitor_codigo=m.Codigo left join Semestre as s ON g.semestre_identificador=s.Identificador left join Administrador as a ON s.administrador_codigo=a.Codigo left join Curso as c ON g.curso_nemonico=c.Nemonico left join Franja as f ON g.Identificador=f.grupo_identificador left join Tema as t ON c.Nemonico=t.curso_nemonico
WHERE g.Identificador = #{idGrupo}

c.Nemonico as c_Nemonico, c.nombre as c_nombre, c.creditos as c_creditos, c.horas_monitoria as c_horas_monitoria,
t.Identificador as t_Identificador, t.nombre as t_nombre, t.descripcion as t_descripcion
FROM Grupo as g left join Profesor as p ON g.profesor_codigo=p.Codigo left join Monitor as m ON g.monitor_codigo=m.Codigo left join Semestre as s ON g.semestre_identificador=s.Identificador left join Administrador as a ON s.administrador_codigo=a.Codigo left join Curso as c ON g.curso_nemonico=c.Nemonico left join Franja as f ON g.Identificador=f.grupo_identificador left join Tema as t ON c.Nemonico=t.curso_nemonico
